snippet: "NCIS" draws more than 20 million viewers, but the premiere of ABC's "Work It" does not fair nearly as well.
abstract: "NCIS" draws more than 20 million viewers, but the premiere of ABC's "Work It" does not fair nearly as well.
lead_paragraph: With the return of new programming CBS resumed its usual Tuesday-night perch as the No. 1 network in total viewers and in the 18-to-49-year-old demographic. "NCIS" led the way as it broke the 20-million total viewer barrier while "NCIS: Los Angeles" had its largest audience of the season with 17 million.

headline.main: New Programming, Same Old Results as CBS Reigns
